title: Randomness Personified.
content:
Quoted:

_“Avoiding danger is no safer in the long run than  
outright exposure. Life is either a daring adventure, or nothing.”_    
— Helen Keller

Noted:

_Top 10 Questions to Build a Better Understanding of the Boss._ Courtesy of [Fast Company](http://web.archive.org/web/20051109113043/http:/www.fastcompany.com/magazine/03/tenquestions.html)
author: Miss Tiffany
